argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_atelch | |- ( B e. HAtoms -> B e. CH ) |
| 2 |  | #P_chincl | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A i^i B ) e. CH ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( A i^i B ) e. CH ) |
| 4 |  | #P_atcveq0 | |- ( ( ( A i^i B ) e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylancom | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cvexch | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) <oH B <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_bitr3d | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = 0H <-> A <oH ( A vH B ) ) ) |
